title: Value cannot be converted to type double without overflow: inf
body_html:
File "train.py", line 37, in reg
l2_reg = l2_reg + W.norm(2)**2
File "/usr/local/torch3/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/autograd/variable.py", line 396, in norm
return super(Variable, self).norm(p)
RuntimeError: value cannot be converted to type double without overflow: inf

My Pytorch Version is:

import torch
print(torch.version)
0.3.0.post4

How could be avoid this error?
